sentences.chinese: 二月丁巳，平恩侯許嘉為左將軍。
sentences.literal: Second month dingsi, Ping'en Marquis Xu Jia as Left General.

sentences.chinese: 中少府貢禹為御史大夫。十二月丁未，長信少府薛廣德為御史大夫。
sentences.literal: Central Superintendent Gong Yu as Imperial Secretary. Twelfth month dingwei, Changxin Superintendent Xue Guangde as Imperial Secretary.
Nine. Seventh month, Zichang dismissed, retired to his mansion.

sentences.chinese: 九月，衛尉平昌侯王接為大司馬、車騎將軍。二月，廣德免。
sentences.literal: Ninth month, Guard Commander Pingchang Marquis Wang Jie as Grand Marshal, Chariot Cavalry General. Second month, Guangde dismissed.

sentences.chinese: 七月，太子太傅韋玄成為御史大夫。
sentences.literal: Seventh month, Crown Prince Grand Tutor Wei Xuancheng as Imperial Secretary.
Third month renxu new moon, solar eclipse.

sentences.chinese: 二月丁酉，御史大夫韋玄成為丞相，封扶陽侯。丞相賢子。
sentences.literal: Second month dingyou, Imperial Secretary Wei Xuancheng as Chancellor, enfeoffed Fuyang Marquis. Chancellor Xian son.

sentences.chinese: 七月，太常任千秋為奮武將軍，擊西羌；雲中太守韓次君為建威將軍，擊羌。後不行。
sentences.literal: Seventh month, Grand Minister of Ceremonies Ren Qianqiu as Fenwu General, attacked Western Qiang; Yunzhong Governor Han Cijun as Jianwei General, attacked Qiang. Later not carried out.

sentences.chinese: 二月丁酉，右扶風鄭弘為御史大夫。
sentences.literal: Second month dingyou, Right Fufeng Zheng Hong as Imperial Secretary.
